item.description:
Welcome to Solstice Healing Arts Center in Medway MA
We have everything you need to help you relax and nourish your soul.
Yoga, Massage, Reiki, Psychic Readings, Energy Healings and workshops.
We also have great rental space available
Some of our activities are listed below. See our calendar for a complete list of details, dates. and times.
Momentum Fitness - Evening Boot Camp with Rachel - Tuesdays and Thursdays at 7:00pm
Truly You Yoga with Meagan - starts in September
Open House with Rhys - Rhys Thomas Institute of Energy Medicine in September
Crystal Bowl Meditation with Rhys - September 9th
Reiki I & Reiki II with Lisa starts in September
Natural Herbals with Suzanne workshops in September and October
Channelling Series with Pat in September (13th & 27th)
Goddess Playshop with Kathleen September 20th
Psychic 101 with Lisa starts in September
Psychic Self Defense with Lisa coming in October
Pre-registration required for all classes. Call Solstice at 508 533-0669 Solsticehealing@yahoo.com
At Solstice Healing Arts Center in Medway MA 508 533-0669 163 Main Street, Suite 6 Medway, MA 02053 www.solsticehealing.com
item.name: Solstice Healing Arts Center
